anime.description: The anime is an omnibus short format that will tell stories of the strange and bizarre in our world, including UFOs, cryptids, curses, ancient civilizations, supernatural powers, spiritual experiences, bizarre cases, different dimensions, and urban legends, told in a picture show style. The anime seeks to evoke the retro atmosphere of pulp horror stories that were popular in the 60s and 70s in magazines. Source: ANN

tag.name: elements
tag.description: Next to Themes setting the backdrop for the protagonists in anime, there are the more detailed plot Elements that centre on character interactions: "What do characters do to each other or what is done to them?". Is it violent Action, an awe-inspiring Adventure in a foreign place, the gripping life of a Detective, a slapstick Comedy, an Ecchi Harem anime, a SciFi epic, or some Fantasy travelling adventure?

tag.name: horror
tag.description: The horror cinematic genre is characterized by the attempt to make the viewer experience dread, fear, terror, or horror. Often their plots involve the intrusion of an evil force, event or personage, sometimes of supernatural origin, on the mundane world and the consequences thereof.

tag.name: photographic backgrounds
tag.description: Real-life backgrounds, with the possible addition of a few 2D elements are shown / used in the anime.

tag.name: slide show animation
tag.description: The entire anime or parts of it show sequences of still images. Sometimes used in low budged animations for action scenes.

tag.name: short episodes
tag.description: Short episodes are regular episodes that are much shorter than the standard length. This means up to and including 10 minutes; shows with episodes that are 11 to 20 minutes in length are http://anidb.net/t6494 [half-length episodes] instead. Not to be confused with http://anidb.net/t6349 [multi-segment episodes], which are regular episodes that are split into several short segments (parts), usually with separate titles and independent storylines.

tag.name: live-action imagery
tag.description: This anime incorporates still images and/or video footage of real-world objects and locations into the animation.

tag.name: technical aspects
tag.description: It may sometimes be useful to know about technical aspects of a show, such as information about its broadcasting or censorship. Such information can be found here.

tag.name: speculative fiction
tag.description: Speculative fiction is an umbrella genre encompassing fiction with certain elements that do not exist in the real world, often in the context of supernatural, futuristic or other imaginative themes. This includes, but is not limited to, science fiction, fantasy, superhero fiction, horror, utopian and dystopian fiction, fairytale fantasy, supernatural fiction, as well as combinations thereof. Source: Wikipedia

episode.title: 謎の円形の正体
What the Mysterious Circle Really Was
Nazo no Enkei no Shoutai
episode.summary: A farmer and his son are astonished one evening to find crop circles forming outside their home. Could it be aliens... or something even more sinister? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 荒野を駆ける死神
The Reaper Racing Across the Plain
Kouya o Kakeru Shinigami
episode.summary: A hitchhiker on a desert road is picked up by a pretty blonde. But he quickly finds out that there`s more to her car than meets the eye... and he`s just embarked on a one-way journey to hell. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 雪の中の妖精
The Fairy in the Snow
Yuki no Naka no Yousei
episode.summary: A boy builds a snowman, only to see it destroyed by his abusive father. Then, during a blizzard, the snowman shows up outside his window, beckoning him to go outside. Is this the start of a magical adventure, or something far more sinister? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 誘惑の黒い影
The Black Shadow of Temptation
Yuuwaku no Kuroi Kage
episode.summary: A man is haunted by horrible dreams, and wakes up in the middle of the night to find his wife getting dressed and leaving. Suspecting an affair, he follows her, but he finds something beyond his wildest imagination. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 病にかからぬ謎の民
The Mysterious Natives Who Never Get Sick
Yamai ni Kakaranu Nazo no Tami
episode.summary: A man ventures into the jungle in search of his wife, who was researching a tribe that never got sick. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 無邪気な道化師
The Innocent Clown
Mujaki na Doukeshi
episode.summary: Two sisters are stuck at home on a cloudy day, after reading a story about a killer clown that drags its victims to the otherworld. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 砂に消えた悪夢
The Nightmare That Disappeared into the Sand
Suna ni Kieta Akumu
episode.summary: Three teenagers are playing on an expensive private beach when they see a giant creature washed up on the shore. Two of them want to take pictures of the creature to sell to a magazine. The other wants to get out of there as fast as possible. All of them will suffer. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 機械人がやってくる
The Mechanical Men Come
Kikaijin ga Yatte Kuru
episode.summary: A man eating dinner is interrupted when everyone around him turns out to be a robot. He struggles against the robot invasion, leading a rebellion from beneath the sewers of the city. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 霧につつまれた樹木
The Tree Shrouded in Fog
Kiri ni Tsutsumareta Jumoku
episode.summary: A girl`s soul is trapped forever in a sinister tree. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 海底に蠢く赤い目
The Red Eyes at the Bottom of the Sea
Kaitei ni Ugomeku Akai Me
episode.summary: A vacationing couple are turned into fishmen by an evil scientist. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 地底からの呼び声
The Call from Beneath the Earth
Chitei kara no Yobigoe
episode.summary: At a secret spot on an island nation, lovers are turned to stone. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 最期を見つめる奇面
The Strange Mask That Sees the End
Saigo o Mitsumeru Kimen
episode.summary: A mysterious mask brings doom to all who put it on. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 不幸を呼ぶ呪いの箱
The Cursed Box That Brings Misery
Fukou o Yobu Noroi no Hako
episode.summary: In an abandoned mansion lies a box that brings misery to all who touch it. Source: crunchyroll
